effect.Name: Krita Freeze-Reflect (Background)
effect.description: (The effect comes from the Krita) Mix of Freeze and Reflect blending modes.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Krita Freeze-Reflect (Background) Shader | 1.0 (06.08.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Krita) Mix of Freeze and Reflect blending modes.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
